title: @Riot KateyKhaos: You Literally Saw a Bug, Said you'd fix it, and 2 patches later nothing happened
body:
I'm talking about Jade Fang's Cassiopeia's E the bug I have been reporting ever since her rework hit live.
Why the hell isn't it fixed yet?

replies.body: dont call people out over a visual bug that does nothing. thats pretty rude. there are worse bugs in need of fixing

This issue will be fixed in 5.4 :] 

Thanks for your patience!
wow op needs to get slapped right across his face.

They also know about the double nami classic skin bug but they haven't fixed that yet because it REALLY doesn't matter that much.

Chill dude, they'll get to it.
Also for that I remember hearing about how the code for the game is so poorly organised that if they dont test it after removing the other classic skin it might crash the game

Its not like its even that bad of a bug, sure its weird but not game breaking. There are a lot of bugs right now, specially with the new Patch coming out (plus its not patching for a lot of people me included). I dont see why you take such personal offense to this even calling out KateyKhaos, who has been nothing but nice to us complainers.

I did say we'd fix it! 

Unfortunately, not everything gets fixed the next patch. The Jade Fang Cassiopeia bug you're referring to was created on January 23rd.  As compared to other issues, such as a skill not working, this is not a major bug that requires immediate attention. 

With that being said, it's a known issue, and is going to be fixed. (I've gone ahead and brought the issue to the team's attention.)
Until riot outright says it's not a bug, it's a bug.

While we have the attention of riot... http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/loZOfHdQ-gameplay-master-yis-alpha-strike-against-baron-and-dragon-is-severely-bugged can we get some notice on this... I don't care if you red post on it or not, I just want to make sure it gets noticed. It's a MAJOR GAMEPLAY flaw.
